parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID to validate upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timeliness of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, used to identify your permission to use. Valid for 28800s and expires at 6 hours.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for shop APIs.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id using sha256 hashing algorithm.

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if the error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error detail if the error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for API request for error tracking

children.name: exists
children.description: Indicates whether the order has enabled or disabled the packaging fee configuration. True means enabled, otherwise false. The order does not charge a packaging fee.

children.name: dimension
children.description: Retrieved only if enabled is set to True

children.name: length
children.description: The length of the packaging in centimeters (cm)

children.name: width
children.description: The width of the packaging in centimeters (cm)

children.name: height
children.description: The height of the packaging in centimeters (cm)

children.name: packaging_fee
children.description: Retrieved only if enabled is set to True

children.name: value
children.description: The packaging fee price in the seller's local currency
